meta.description: Metadata about the media plan document itself

id.description: Unique identifier for this media plan document

schema_version.description: Version of the media plan schema used (e.g., '2.0')

name.description: Human-readable name for the media plan

created_by_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who created this media plan

created_by_name.description: Full name of the user who created this media plan

created_at.description: Timestamp when this media plan was created in ISO 8601 format

comments.description: General comments or notes about this media plan

is_current.description: Whether this is the current/active version of the media plan

is_archived.description: Whether this media plan has been archived

parent_id.description: Identifier of the parent media plan if this is a revision or copy

campaign.description: Campaign information and configuration for this media plan

lineitems.description: Collection of individual line items that make up the media plan

dictionary.description: Configuration dictionary defining custom field settings and captions
